hero.tagline: From Hanoi - Amsterdam High School — When I say Green, you say Ams!

about.title: About us
about.p1: We are GreenAms Robotics Team 24751 from Vietnam, a team with two years of competitive experience at both the national and international levels of the FIRST Tech Challenge.
about.p2: Following an outstanding and highly successful 2024–2025 season, we return to the FTC 2025-2026 season with open minds and a desire to share the lessons we've learned along the way. Join us as we kick off the DECODE season!

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.desc: We're deeply grateful to our sponsors for believing in our mission and helping us build, learn, and share our passion for robotics.

awards.header2: While accolades aren't our first priority, they serve as meaningful reminders of our efforts and teamwork.

resources.heading: Resources
resources.desc: What we give back to the community

overview.heading: Bamboo Bot
overview.d1: Bamboo Bot is the first open-source robot design specifically for new FTC teams in Vietnam, developed by GART Team 24751 for the FTC DECODE 2025-2026 season. With a minimalist design and high flexibility, Bamboo Bot uses standard FTC components easily found locally, combined with cost-saving solutions such as a drivetrain using ball bearings instead of omni wheels, an intake-transfer mechanism using rubber bands, and a high-performance single flywheel shooter.
overview.d2: Accompanied by detailed CAD files and clearly written, easily customizable code, Bamboo Bot provides a solid foundation for new teams—especially those lacking mentors—to focus on learning and skill development rather than struggling with complex designs from scratch.
